name: Stone Platform
description: Creates a 8x8 stone platform after flying for 10 blocks. It's perfect for building something under your island!.

name: Minion Auto Smelter
description: Minion Auto Smelter can be used as a minion upgrade to automatically smelts items that the minion collects, and it can be equipped by some minions.

name: Enchanted cobblestone
description: Enchanted cobblestone is an uncommon item in CraftersMc, crafted using 160 regular cobblestone. It is used for crafting tools, and upgrading minions.

name: Compactor
description: Compactor can be used as a minion upgrade to automatically turn items that the minion collects into their block forms, and it can be equipped by some minions.

name: Silverfish Pet
description: The Silverfish Pet is a mining pet that provides Defense and True Defense Boost. It can be crafted using Enchanted Cobblestone and a Duck Egg or upgraded through Doloresâ€™ Pet Care.

name: Miner Armor
description: Miner Armor is a defensive set in CraftersMc that grants +100 Defense in total. Its Full Set Bonus provides permanent Haste II, making it ideal for mining. The armor is crafted using Enchanted Cobblestone, with each piece requiring a different amount.

name: Super Compactor 3000
description: Super Compactor 3000 can be used as a minion upgrade to automatically turn items that the minion collects into their enchanted forms, and it can be equipped by all minions..

name: Enchanted Coal
description: Enchanted Coal can be used as a minion fuel, giving +10% speed for 24 hours, and it can be equipped by all minions.

name: Enchanted Charcoal
description: Enchanted Charcoal can be used as a minion fuel, giving +20% speed for 36 hours, and it can be equipped by all minions.

name: Enchanted Coal Block
description: Enchanted Coal Block is an uncommon item in CraftersMc, crafted using 160 Enchanted Coal. It is used for crafting tools, and upgrading minions.

name: Enchanted Lava Bucket
description: Enchanted Lava Bucket can be used as a minion fuel, giving +25% speed for unlimited duration, and it can be equipped by all minions.

name: Wither Skeleton Pet
description: The Wither Skeleton Pet boosts combat stats and reduces damage from skeletons. It is crafted with 8 Enchanted Coal Blocks and 1 Super Enchanted Duck Egg, with an 80% chance for Epic and 20% for Legendary.

name: Enchanted Iron
description: Enchanted Iron is an uncommon item in CraftersMc, crafted using 160 regular Iron. It is used for crafting tools, and upgrading minions.

name: Enchanted Iron Block
description: Enchanted Iron Block is an uncommon item in CraftersMc, crafted using 160 Enchanted Iron. It is used for crafting tools, and upgrading minions.

name: Budget Hopper
description: Budget Hopper can be used as a minion automated shipping item to automatically sell items for 50% of their NPC selling price when its inventory is full, and it can be equipped by all minions.

name: Enchanted Hopper
description: Enchanted Hopper can be used as a minion automated shipping item to automatically sell items for 90% of their NPC selling price when its inventory is full, and it can be equipped by all minions.

name: Golem Armor
description: Golem Armor is a Rare armor set in CraftersMc, crafted using Enchanted Iron. It provides a total of +200 HP and +245 Defense. The full set grants the Absorption ability, which gives 20 seconds of Absorption II upon killing an enemy.

name: Golem Sword
description: The Golem Sword is a Rare-tier weapon in Hypixel SkyBlock crafted using 2 Enchanted Iron Blocks and 1 Stick. It grants +85 Damage, +125 Strength, and +30 Defense. Its special ability, Iron Punch, deals 250 base Ability Damage in a hexagonal area when activated (Right Click), costing 70 Mana with a 3-second cooldown.

name: Personal Compactor 4000
description: Automatically deletes selected items on pickup. (1 item limit)

name: Personal Compactor 5000
description: Automatically deletes selected items on pickup. (3 item limit)

name: Personal Compactor 6000
description: Automatically deletes selected items on pickup. (7 item limit)

name: Personal Compactor 7000
description: Automatically deletes selected items on pickup. (13 item limit)

name: Cleaver
description: The Cleaver is an Uncommon sword that deals +40 Damage and +10 Strength. Its ability hits nearby enemies in a 3-block range when striking a target, making it great for early-game crowd control.

name: Enchanted Gold
description: Enchanted Gold is an uncommon item in CraftersMc, crafted using 160 regular Gold. It is used for crafting tools, and upgrading minions.

name: Enchanted Gold Block
description: Enchanted Gold block is rare item in CraftersMc, crafted using 160 Enchanted Gold. It is used for crafting tools, and upgrading minions.

name: Enchanted Diamond Block
description: Enchanted Diamond Block is an rare item in CraftersMc, crafted using 160 Enchanted Diamond. It is used for crafting tools, and upgrading minions.

name: Enchanted Diamond
description: Enchanted Diamond is an rare item in CraftersMc, crafted using 160 regular Diamond. It is used for crafting tools, and upgrading minions.

name: Diamond Spreading
description: Diamond Spreading can be used as a minion upgrade to randomly generate diamonds, and it can be equipped by all minions including Diamond Minions. In average, it generates one Diamond for every 10 items generated.

name: Hardened Diamond Armor
description: Hardened Diamond Armor is a Rare armor set in CraftersMc, crafted using Diamond 7. It provides +330 total Defense, making it a strong early-game armor choice..

name: Bottle o' Enchanting
description: Bottle o' Enchanting can be thrown on the ground to gain XP. It grants 8 XP if player's Enchanting is level 0, and 24 XP if they are level 50.

name: Grand Experience Bottle
description: Grand Experience Bottle can be thrown on the ground to gain XP. It grants 1,500 XP if player's Enchanting is level 0, and 4,500 XP if they are level 50.

name: Titanic Experience Bottle
description: Titanic Experience Bottle can be thrown on the ground to gain XP. It grants 250,000 XP if player's Enchanting is level 0, and 750,000 XP if they are level 50.

name: Enchanted Lapis
description: Enchanted Lapis is an uncommon item in CraftersMc, crafted using 160 regular Lapis. It is used for crafting tools, and upgrading minions.

name: Enchanted Lapis Block
description: Enchanted Lapis Block is an uncommon item in CraftersMc, crafted using 160 Enchanted Lapis. It is used for crafting tools, and upgrading minions.

name: Experience Artifact
description: Every single experience orb grants 25% more XP..

name: Textbook
description: Increases the pet's Intelligence by 100%. Textbook is a Rarity pet augment. It cannot be taken back after given to pet.
